title: Citi Wins Regional and Country Awards in the Euromoney Trade Finance Survey 2021
summary: Citi topped a total of 18 regional and country rankings across the "Market Leader" and "Best Service" award categories in the 2021 Euromoney Trade Finance Survey.
tag-1: Citi Wins Regional and Country Awards in the Euromoney Trade Finance Survey 2021
tag-3: Citi topped a total of 18 regional and country rankings across the "Market Leader" and "Best Service" award categories in the 2021 Euromoney Trade Finance Survey.
tag-4: Every year, Euromoney surveys consumers of trade-finance services to rank and assess their top providers. In this year's survey, over 11,000 votes were cast.
tag-5: Ebru Pakcan, Global Head of Trade, Treasury & Trade Solutions, Citi, says, "We are delighted with the strong recognition from our clients in this important industry survey. In a time of tremendous change and strain for the industry we are keeping our clients at the heart of all we do and focused on supporting them by delivering a more digital and interconnected experience."
tag-6: Citi's wins in the 2021 Euromoney Trade Finance Survey are listed below:
tag-7: Market Leader: Africa Latin America Algeria Brazil Kazakhstan Paraguay
tag-8: Best Service: Central and Eastern Europe—Best Service for Advisory Latin America—All service categories Latin America—Best Service for Advisory Latin America—Best Service for Digital offering Latin America—Best Service for Market insight Latin America—Best Service for Support and advisory Algeria—All service categories Argentina—All service categories Brazil—All service categories Kazakhstan—All service categories Paraguay—All service categories Turkey—All service categories
tag-9: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
tag-10: Additional information may be found at www.citigroup.com | Twitter: @Citi | YouTube: www.youtube.com/citi | Blog: http://blog.citigroup.com | Facebook: www.facebook.com/citi | LinkedIn: www.linkedin.com/company/citi.
tag-11: Citi's Treasury and Trade Solutions Citi Treasury and Trade Solutions (TTS) enables our clients' success by providing an integrated suite of innovative and tailored cash management and trade finance services to multinational corporations, financial institutions and public sector organizations across the globe. Based on the foundation of the industry's largest proprietary network with banking licenses in over 90 countries and globally integrated technology platforms, TTS continues to lead the way in offering the industry's most comprehensive range of digitally enabled treasury, trade and liquidity management solutions.
